mapper.select: SELECT b.id bid, b.`name` bname, b.logo, b.url, g.id, g.`name`, g.img, g.marketprice, g.sellprice, g.clickcount, g.brandId FROM `brand` b JOIN ((SELECT g.id, g.`name`, g.img, g.marketprice, g.sellprice, g.clickcount, g.brandId FROM goods g WHERE g.brandId = 1 ORDER BY g.createtime DESC LIMIT 10) UNION ALL (SELECT g.id, g.`name`, g.img, g.marketprice, g.sellprice, g.clickcount, g.brandId FROM goods g WHERE g.brandId = 2 ORDER BY g.createtime DESC LIMIT 10) ) g ON g.brandId = b.id where b.isRecommend = 0 ORDER BY bid ASC
